Required python packages:
=========================

  * scipy

  * cairocffi

  * matplotlib

  * astropy

  * pandas

  * tensorflow

  * h5py

  * sqlalchemy

  * pygit

  * pymysql

  * asteval

  * antlr4

  * antl4

  * antlr4-python3-runtime

  * configargparse

  * GitPython

  * pytransit

  * tqdm

  * arviz

  * celerite corner emcee
